[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#335d95″ background_image=”https://solarvoltenergia.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/case-parque-avenida.jpg” background_blend=”multiply” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;|| align-items: center;|| justify-content: center;”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#081F4D” header_font=”Bebas Neue||||||||” header_2_font=”Bebas Neue|||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”40px” custom_margin=”16px||||false|false” border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#FFFFFF”]

CASE DE SUCESSO EM DESTAQUE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#081F4D” header_font=”Bebas Neue||||||||” header_2_font=”Bebas Neue|||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_3_font=”Bebas Neue|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.79)” header_3_font_size=”28px” custom_margin=”16px||7px||false|false” border_color_bottom=”#FFFFFF”]

CONDOMÍNIO PARQUE AVENIDA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.78)” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”24px” custom_margin=”-3px||24px||false|false”]

A SolarVolt Energia participou da concepção do projeto fotovoltaico desde a fase de construção do condomínio e acompanhou o amadurecimento dos condôminos com relação à decisão de investir em geração própria.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Baixe o case” button_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#FAE400″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#081c44″ button_border_radius=”0px” button_font=”Roboto||||||||” button_icon=”%%3%%” button_icon_color=”#FAE400″ custom_margin=”|||0px|false|false” custom_padding=”|||0px|false|false” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” button_border_width__hover=”2px” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#081c44″ button_bg_color__hover=”” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”off”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;|| align-items: center;|| justify-content: center;”] [/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”24px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”24px||24px||false|false”]

Veja o vídeo

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
